about_the_game:
In "Medieval Heroes Gold Hunt" immerse yourself in a kingdom of endless riches where your path to fortune lies in your hands—literally! By swiping your heroes, you’ll generate gold and unlock powerful new characters to join your ever-growing roster. Each hero contributes to your wealth, bringing you closer to ruling the richest kingdom in the realm. Upgrade your heroes to increase their gold-generating abilities and watch your fortune multiply. The more you swipe, the richer you become!

Features:

- Gold Swipe Mechanic: Earn gold by swiping your heroes, with each swipe increasing your wealth.
- Character Unlocks: Purchase and unlock a wide range of medieval heroes, from knights to queens, each offering more gold as you progress.
- Hero Upgrades: Enhance your heroes to boost their gold production and maximize your earnings.
- Letter Click Bonuses: Occasionally, a letter will appear on the screen. Click it to receive a gold boost or a free upgrade, adding an element of surprise to your gameplay.
